question: Which of the following bodies had established the Vishwakarma Awards to promote innovative spirit and scientific temperament?
option1: All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE)
option4: Council of Scientific and Industrial Research (CSIR)
answer: All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE)
explanation: Union HRD Minister Ramesh Pokhriyal ‘Nishank’ presented Vishwakarma Awards 2019 to the winners in New Delhi on February 24, 2020. The awards function was organised by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE). Chatra Vishwakarma Awards (CVA) were given to students and mentors. Institutes were felicitated under the Utkrisht Sansthan Vishwakarma Award (USVA). The awards were started by AICTE in 2017 for promoting innovative spirit and scientific temperament.
